description: grease +â€Ž ball; derived from the fact that Italian-Americans are stereotyped as having greasy or greased-up hair, e.g. John Travolta in Grease and Saturday Night Fever.

entries.meaning: (US, slang, derogatory, ethnic slur) A person of Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Greek, other Mediterranean, or Latin American descent.
examples: Hyponyms: dago, Eyetie, goombah, guido, guinea, wog, wop (Italian)

entries.meaning: (slang) A rocker or metalhead, especially one who listens to 1950s rock and roll or 1980s thrash metal.
